title: Ghana’s Road Carnage: The Real Problem Is Behind the Steering Wheel
description: Road traffic accidents (RTAs) in Ghana have assumed the character of a national public health crisis. Over the past decade, road crashes, injuries, and fatalities have followed a disturbing upward trajectory, despite sustained investments in road infrastructure, traffic enforcement, and public education. title: Israeli security forces launch multi-day operation in West Bank's Hebron
description: According to an IDF statement, the operation will be held with the Shin Bet security service and will focus on the Jabel Johar neighborhood in Hebron. In November, 22 Palestinians were arrested in a similar operation carried out by Israeli forces in Jenin
